entry.title: Sunday: Showers at times heavy. High 15.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this morning. Showers at times heavy beginning early this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High 15. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers at times heavy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain showers at times heavy changing to freezing rain near midnight. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Ice pellets mixed with snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning late in the afternoon. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
